text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Since #Individual1 walked off the job to focus on freeing criminals & bullying people online, right now they're all working together to save Americans from #COVID19, keep the economic crisis under control, & create peace amid the chaos. They also focused & united to elect #Biden.
